about_the_game:
Winter Heat is a no-choices kinetic novel game about love in the internet age.

Javiera Vera is a freelancer living in the sweltering summer of Santiago, in Chile.

Fukkoshi Shio is an office worker living in the snowy rural town of Miyazu, Kyoto, in Japan.

The two are long-time internet friends, living across the world, across time zones, but with a bond as strong as the fiber optic cables connecting them. How will that bond transform, though, during one special December?

Follow Javi and Shio through their online chats and video calls as they grow even closer together.

Features:

  • A fluffy, fun romance story across continents.

  • Totally linear storyline with some unlockable chapters.

  • 2-3 hours of gameplay.

  • Bonus game included: Oomfie RPG!

short_description: Javi lives in Santiago, and Shio lives in Kyoto. They're best friends over the internet, until one fateful December brings them even closer together than ever before. A linear visual novel about long-distance love.
